title: "Technology minister urges caution on AI 'Terminator' warnings"
excerpt: "Tech minister Paul Scully has warned so-called \"Terminator-style\" risks to humanity from artificial intelligence (AI) should not be highlighted at the expense of the good it can do. The Terminator sci-fi film franchise envisages a malevolent AI \"Skynet\" system bent on humanity's destruction."
